il download and wait for the crack :)

If you want to enable Physx download the "Demo with Physx", copy "BmLauncher.exe" from the demo install directory to the full game install directory and run it... Physx settings will now show at the bottom... setting High recommends using a 9800gtx+ for dedicated Physx... ran fine on my GTX280 1920x1200

Another way to turn on physx as the ingame menu option isnt there simply go to my documents and settings/eidos/batman etc and
find the files:
BmEngine.ini & UserEngine.ini with notepad and search for: PhysXLevel=0
Change that to either a 1 or 2 & save. (1=low 2=high )

You can also fix the Glide/run issue. 

Find the BaseInput.ini file right click it and in properties remove write protection press apply.

In the file find the word "SpaceBar" and change it to the key of your choosing i chosed "RightShift" (notice the big letter of the word.) 

Then save the file and close, now  right click it again and in properties reapply write protection.

Now in the game the glide issue is solved VOILA!!!
btw the save issue should be helped if you have windows LIVE! installed as from games like GTAVI

Eidos must have spent a lot of money on the security for this game and you can just bypass it by editing a file. ROFL.

Will finish the download soon and see if this works.

Everyone with the Second Scarecrow level Gripling issue.. i did what budakrist wrote.. the gravity method.. beleive me its very hard to control batman in air.. with gravity but after 40 minutes of trying.. i actually could get close enough to the other side.. and the checkpoint sign started to load.. then i just click restart from checkpoint and i was already in the other side.. and was able to finish the level.. with no problems.. ive not being playing longer through the game so i dont know if later i will find antoher problem.. but so far.. ive passed that second scarecrow level..

Quoted from Budakrist:
Gravity Method:

Go into the \BmGame\Config\DefaultGame.ini file, right click it and go to properties then unchek the read only option.. now go inside the file and change the gravity from -1000.0 to something like -50.0 gonna take a lot of tries, It's very hard to control batman when floating but it does work..(after you passed that part. remember to put the gravity back as it was..)

PD. If anybody needs a more detailed way of how I did it to cross over that part.. feel free to email me.. at ilragazzo83@hotmail.com.. I will try to help you the most I can..

If your having trouble in the game with grapple or anything in general. There is a trainer on Gamecopyworld that will let you use the number pad to move on the X Y and Z axis.

Here is the link http://dl.gamecopyworld.com/?d=2009&f=Batman_Arkham_Asylum_V1.0_Plus_4_Trainer_By_KelSat!rar

Enjoy ^_^
